headline: Former President Trump endorses Dr. Oz for US Senate in Pennsylvania
author: Adam Sabes
sentences: "The Great Commonwealth of Pennsylvania has a tremendous opportunity to Save America by electing the brilliant and well-known Dr. Mehmet Oz for the United States Senate," a statement from Trump says.
"Dr. Oz is Pro-Life, very strong on Crime, the Border, Election Fraud, our Great Military, and our vets, Tax Cuts, and will always fight for and support our under-siege Second Amendment.
Trump's announcement comes after David McCormick, another candidate for the Senate seat, met with Trump on Wednesday at Mar-a-Lago.
But President Trump wisely endorsed me because I’m a Conservative who will stand up to Joe Biden and the woke Left," Oz said.
Former President Trump has endorsed Dr. Mehmet Oz for the U.S. Senate seat in Pennsylvania, a Saturday announcement states.
